This repository follows the process and acceptance criteria in `docs/standards/hcs-4.md`.

## Scope

- Spec: `docs/standards/hcs-XX.md`
- Review focus:

## Notes

- [ ] Clarity: motivation and scope are clear; non-goals listed if helpful
- [ ] Completeness: required sections present with implementable detail
- [ ] Conformance: MUST/SHOULD requirements are testable; error handling specified where applicable
- [ ] Interoperability: test vectors / multi-impl plan present (Standard Track)
- [ ] Security & privacy: threats/mitigations; privacy section if personal data is involved
- [ ] Backwards compatibility: migration guidance or rationale for breaking change
- [ ] References: related HCS + relevant external standards
- [ ] Governance record: filled only at publication (PASS reference)

## Requested Changes

## Decision (optional)

- Proposed outcome: Draft / Candidate / Final / Reject / Needs more work
